meanings.definition: Of or denoting the sex that can bear offspring or produce eggs
meanings.sent1: The zoo had a special exhibit featuring female lions.
meanings.sent2: The females in the bird species lay eggs to hatch their young.
meanings.sent3: The female penguin waddled around proudly, showing off her egg.
meanings.sent4: In the insect world, female ants are the true rulers of the colony.
meanings.sent5: The female seahorse carries the eggs in a unique pouch until they hatch.

meanings.definition: A female person, animal, or plant
meanings.sent1: The farm had many females, including cows, hens, and sheep.
meanings.sent2: The females in the group were all excited about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The female cat purred contently as she basked in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with beautiful female flowers in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The female teacher greeted her students with a warm smile every morning.

meanings.definition: Belonging to the sex that can bear offspring or produce eggs
meanings.sent1: The female turtle laid her eggs on the sandy beach.
meanings.sent2: The females of the species are known for their nurturing instincts.
meanings.sent3: The female tree in the garden bore delicious fruits every summer.
meanings.sent4: The female fish swam gracefully among the colorful coral reefs.
meanings.sent5: The female rabbit dug a burrow to protect her young from predators.
